name: Silent Kitchen: Mouse Mishap
description:
A little game for our first gamejam (RubiVGM and mine)

He did the soundtrack for the game while I did the graphics and programming of the game

You are a mouse and you want the cheese. However there is a, not very bright, orange cat in the way. You adapted to his presence by using the traps placed once to trap you, to trap him.
Pro tip: If you jump, the cat jumps

Only non self-produced asset is the font which is: Press Start 2P
